I believe this should be possible. The integration wires up registration of Zapier calls to specific types of [global events](https://docs.kentico.com/x/r4t1CQ) in Xperience - one of those global events that can be hooked into is [when a web page is published](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-zapier/blob/v2.1.0/src/Kentico.Xperience.Zapier/Triggers/Handlers/PageHandler.cs#L65).
However, the [Usage Guide](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-zapier/blob/v2.1.0/docs/Usage-Guide.md#supported-trigger-events) states that only custom workflow steps are supported as triggers.
I recommend opening an issue on the GitHub repository to ask about this scenario and request a feature enhancement if it isn't supported.
